author: Rev says desu
description:
Lots of gaming news today. PC Gamer is excusing FPS problems in Avowed, Civ 7 is getting review bombed, SONY releases new "code of conduct" and delay of Fairgame$, Overwatch 2 is getting more desperate in face of Marvel Rivals' success, and GTA 6 PC release date to be in 2026.
